TopicTitle: Is the ship on a planet surface?

Articles.Content:
Is there anyway, using just the .CFG file, to tell if a vessel is actually on a planets or moons surface in such a way as to have the .CFG file do something?

IE:

module

{

onplanet = true

{

dosomething=great!

}

}
Yes. Via a plugin. Configs do nothing on their own.

Thanks. Since I'm not going to learn another programming language, at least at this time, guess I'm outta luck.

Again, thanks for the quick answer.
